article.title: GET _active_tasks
article.description: Retrieve a list of all databases

body.paragraph: This request does not have any required headers.
This request does not use query parameters.
This request does not use a message body.
This response uses only standard HTTP headers.
The response message contains the following object:

row.entry: List of the active task on the server

body.paragraph: The following example requests a list of active tasks on the server. The response returns the active replication tasks on the server.
body.code-block:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Content-Length: 271 Content-Type: application/json Server: Couchbase Sync Gateway/1.2 Date: Fri, 22 Apr 2016 15:10:51 GMT
